A4.text: Turkish is the national language of Turkey

A5.text: Turkish (Türkçe [ˈtyɾktʃe], Türk dili, also known as Türkiye Türkçesi 'Turkish of Turkey') is the most widely spoken of the Turkic languages with around 90 million speakers
